goals__remit:
MÜNZER Bioindustrie (MBI) is with its annual production capacity of >210.000 mto one of the largest producers of sustainable biofuels in CEE and therefore a leading partner of the Central Europe´s agriculture and fossil fuel industry. 
 
The company, which was founded in 1991, is still 100 % family-owned/-operated and has its headquarter near Graz (Styria/Austria). MBI operates with its three business divisions two industrial biofuel plants in Austria (one in Vienna; another in Styria). 
 
According to our mission "From waste to energy" MBI´s aim is it to maximize the sustainability of mainly waste based biofuels and reduce GHG emissions.
